topic.title: Managing a Vertica Preview Cluster from the Management Console

section.title: Viewing Logs
section.p: The Vertica and Vertica AgentTools logs for each node can be accessed via the Vertica Management Console. To view these, navigate to the node details page for a node. In the upper right-hand side of the node details page, select Vertica or AgentTools logs, and enter a date range of entries to view.

body.p: Database Service control plane logs can be accessed via the HPE Helion OpenStack logging service.
